scripts.lint: oxlint && tsc -p convex -noEmit --pretty false && tsc -p . -noEmit --pretty false && convex dev --once && vite build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/.cache node_modules/.tmp dist .turbo && echo '✅ Cleaned build caches'
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && echo '✅ Cleaned everything - run npm install'
scripts.clean:vscode: rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/typescript/* ~/Library/Application\ Support/Code/Cache/* ~/Library/Application\ Support/Code/CachedData/* 2>/dev/null || true && echo '✅ Cleaned VSCode caches - restart VSCode'
